text: Bigu: «Ojo ƣajri Allohi mutaolro [ʙaroi xud dust va] korsoz giram? [Parvardigore] Ki padidovarandai osmonho va zamin ast va Ust, ki ruzi medihad va xud ruzi doda namesavad». Bigu: «Man farmon joftaam, ki naxustin kase [az in ummat] ʙosam, ki taslim [-i amri ilohi] sudaast va [Alloh taolo ʙar man farmon dod, ki]: “Hargiz az musrikon naʙosam”
